column1: u bothetsi ke mme motho enwa
u leshano wena ha se yahao
likhapa ke enwa litlhare ke enwa
bo butleng litlhare ausi mamello angole
koloi ela ha e yo litlhare
litlhare ae ketlauotla ha uitswere hampe tjena
litlhare ake ubone namune ke ena
litlhare hothwe utlonka dipompong ke tsena
litlhare hothwe ubue na ntate mikaele o kae
uatseba ausi mamello akebeahlola aufa bolo yahae
litlhare tloha kebehe ngwana enwa helang
seka otla ngwana enwa wa batho helang
seka etsa moferefere tjena ya mpa etenya enwa
litlhare tloo bue dilamune ke tsena
litlhare mme masebina ke eo otlaumula
e ke yahao le ya ausi mamello
ha usatsamaye feela le ausi mamello
ke lahao retsebe hotlatla hoetsa tobetsa
e le lena lelekholo ke lahao
kere senepe sena sa rona le wena se kae ausi mamello
e hobaneng ntate mikaele otlatla ka mantaha
jwale tjena etlare ha reetsa kalamisa wena waetsa tobetsa
litlhare tloo bone ntate mikaele ke enwa
maoto ahao ha uahlatswe ke eng litlhare
udule hantle u be ngwanana morwetsana
utlobe ngwanana emotle wa mme masebina
utladihela ntho ena ya batho wena
etsisa ntho ena e ka mona
uabona ausi mamello aufile dilamune tsahae
umobotse na mme masebina o kae
mobotse na ntate michael oile kae
ere na ntate mikaele o kae
wena ungola seven jwang na wena
ae ska phetla ka nqa engwe
matsoho a kae a ntate migaele
ngola one etswanang le ena le ena
ya thabo e jwang na banna
litlhare tloo keungolle la likhapha he
ngola lebitso la ntate mikaele mona
eksaese ena ese ebile etletse manteterwane
ha resatseba na hoengola se jwang ka lebaka la ngwana enwa
litlhare nneheletse dijo tseo tsa likhapha
le ausi mamello ke lena lengole
hoitswe ke ya mang bolephene eo
bolephene eo ya mme masebina ke yahao
ke ya ausi mamello bolephene ena
keitse litlhare none likhapha none mme masebina none
hothwe utlongola mme wahao le ntate wahao wena
